mapper.insert: insert into tbl_story (user_num, story_part, story_title, story_content, story_img_name, story_img_uuid, story_img_path) values(#{userNum},#{storyPart}, #{storyTitle}, #{storyContent}, #{storyImgName}, #{storyImgUuid}, #{storyImgPath})
insert into tbl_series (story_num, user_num, series_name) values(#{storyNum}, #{userNum}, #{seriesName})
insert into tbl_story_reply (story_num, story_reply, user_num) values(#{storyNum}, #{storyReply},#{userNum})
